276.author: Kelly McNeil
276.bottom_line: As temperatures increase well above freezing over the next three days the snow surface will become wet and loose.  Signs of instability in the surface snow include roller balls and pinwheels, indicating the snowpack is changing from dry snow to wet snow.  Once temperatures rise above freezing, it's time to travel higher in elevation, change to a shadier aspect, or start heading home.  Don't get caught traveling on or under steep terrain features later in the day that have been getting hit by the sun for multiple hours.
276.hazard_discussion: Today through Tuesday evening a weather system is moving through the area bringing some light rain and snow.  This system will be on its way out Tuesday morning and high pressure will set in once again with drier and warmer temperatures.  We could potentially see temperatures in the 40s and 50s in the mountains starting Wednesday.  Freezing levels will be raising from 3400' today to over 9000' by Wednesday.
